thread.section_title: Coin Advisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Coin Advisor | coinadvisor.com
thread.title: Scott Reeves
thread.title_full: Coin Advisor reviewed by Scott Reeves

author: Scott Reeves
title: Scott Reeves
text:
I have had the pleasure of working with Larry @ Coin Adviser for quite awhile. I have emailed questions-(as I am a novice collector) And do not know about values of coins-PCGS versus NGC, signed coins, etc.
Larry took the time awhile back to call me and suffer a fool and my MANY questions-always with patience and explained the minute details about coins, values, what to avoid, etc.
From that point on, I call Larry and/or Larry will call me about new coins-or regarding info on hard to find coins and advice on coins coming out in the future, etc.
I could not be happier with Coin Adviser, or with Larry-and other reps there, for all of my PSGS coins. I only buy and collect the best-70 coins extant- and of course they are more expensive than other types and grades.
Do yourself a favor and give them a call and work with Larry or one of the other quality reps there.
Scott Reeves
